item.description:
No Wesleyan gathering. This is our annual holiday(s) picnic honoring the ultimate sacrifice of our servicemen and women, and the buddhist holiday known as Fujimatsuri, celebrating the birth of Shinran Shonin, the 13th century religious reformer and founder of Shin Buddhism. This is a potluck event at the Southington Buddhist Fellowship, which includes, food, conversation, new friends, games and dance. Family and friends are invited. This is a wonderful way to start off the summer season. From 2 p.m. to whenever.

Visit our main website at www.bffct.net

Visit our Southington Buddhist Fellowship where the event will take places.

http://southington.bf...
item.how_to_find_us: Just use Google Maps. It's a white colonial home.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Post-Memorial Day and Buddhist Festival Picnic
